title: An Invitation to Japan
creator_contributor_role: Japan. National Tourist Organisation, production company
subject_group: Anthropology, Ethnology, Exploration & Travel/Japan - Description and travel
Anthropology, Ethnology, Exploration & Travel/Japan - Social life and customs
Anthropology, Ethnology, Exploration & Travel/Rites and ceremonies - Japan
Economics, Philosophy, Politics, Religion & Sociology/Rites and ceremonies - Japan
description: Shows the tourist attractions found along Japan's most representative travel route: Tokyo, Nikko, Kamakura, Hakone, Kyoto, Nara, Osaka, highlighting such places as the Great Buddha at Kamakura, the Olympic Games site and the Toshogu Shrine at Nikko. Also shows typical Japanese food, pearls, kimonos, porcelain and textiles.
